bibl.title: What is the Payment ἐνοίκιον in the Greek Ostraca?
bibl.note: "We must assume that these payments are rents, but I prefer to leave the question open."

bibl.title: Proceedings of the XIXth International Congress of Papyrology. II

bibl.seg: EL-GENDY Ibrahim, What is the Payment ἐνοίκιον in the Greek Ostraca?
Proceedings of the XIXth International Congress of Papyrology. II (Cairo, 1992) pp. 169-175.
"We must assume that these payments are rents, but I prefer to leave the question open."
